page.title: 14ECOLOGY 1
page.content: There are some fish fossils in this area but they are hard to find because the rock strata is fractured.There is shale which resembles slates,and some slate which is beginning to crumble, thin bands of sandstone and a bit of limestone,which is very unusual.Local slate was used for building until the last 20-30 years,but manufactured building materials are now cheaper and more popular{BIRDS}:On the cliff path walk in June we saw Herring Gulls, Jackdaws,a Sparrow,a Crow,Black_headed gulls,White_backed gulls, Swallows, Pigeons,a Lark and Fulmars .{FLOWERS: This area is very rich in wild flowers: Betony,Birdsfoot trefoil, Buttercup,Campion,Corn Marigold,Cow Parsley,Crown Vetch,Dock,Dog Rose, Flags,Foxglove,Heather,Honeysuckle, Kidney Vetch,Mullein,Ox_eye Daisy, Periwinkle,Primrose,Seapinks and more
